items.text: back of length outside off, he taps it late to third man
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.preText: A lot of fans leaving the ground at the halfway mark. Afghanistan fans are still there in big numbers
items.text: googly from well outside off, he goes back and cuts it to backward point
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: this one straightens as he quickens it at 91kmh and brings the line closer to off, the batsman pokes and misses
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: way too short, Mahmudullah rocks back and punches it back
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: slows it down on the off stump, he leans forward and pushes the ball into the covers
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: quicker one again outside off, stays a bit low too as the batsman cuts and misses
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: the legbreak is a bit too wide outside off, Mahmudullah keeps his bat well inside the line and Shahzad whips the bails off in a jiffy for some fun
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: he flights it on middle stump, Mosaddek sends it back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: waits for the ball and works it to midwicket from middle stump
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: on the stumps again and he blocks it back without any fuss
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: goes back a bit this time and defends it yet again
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: this one stays a bit low as Mosaddek goes deep in the crease and brings his bat down on middle just in time
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: right on the stumps again, no room and he finds midwicket. It's a maiden
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: ripping legbreak well outside off, he doesn't take the bat close to the ball while pretending to defend
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: too short, he steers it to deep point for one
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.preText: Slip and leg slip in place
items.text: slightly quick on middle stump, he goes back and tucks it to leg for one
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

items.text: the googly comes in from a teasing length outside off, he drives away from the body and misses
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: this one comes in again, it's a bit too short and Mahmudullah picks it to push it into the covers
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: bit too short outside off, he goes back and cuts to deep point
items.shortText: Rashid Khan to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: slightly flat on the off stump, the batsman goes back to cut and gets one
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.preText: Mosaddek batting without a helmet or cap
items.text: hint of room, he stays on the back foot and steers it to short third man
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: some more room and this time he helps it towards backward point for one
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

items.text: poor delivery outside leg, worked away easily to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: slightly slower through the air on middle, he leans forward and pushes it back
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: not much pace again, he waits and then defends it on off
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mosaddek Hossain, no run
